original_title: Election Commission to discuss LG Polls
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Election Commission is scheduled to meet on Tuesday (04) morning.
Commissioner General of Election Saman Sri Ratnayake said matters related to the election will be discussed during the meeting.
Chairman of the Election Commission Nimal Punchihewa said the date of the Local Government Elections will be decided after the 10th of April.
He said if the necessary funds are provided before the 10th, there is a possibility of conducting postal voting for the Local Government Elections before the 25th of April.
